hero.title: Success Stories
hero.subtitle: Real Results from Real Clients Across India

caseStudies.title: Digital Transformation for Leading Private Bank
caseStudies.challenge: The bank was struggling with legacy systems that hindered customer experience and operational efficiency. They needed a complete digital overhaul while ensuring zero downtime.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented a modern core banking platform with cloud-native architecture, mobile banking apps, and integrated payment solutions.

caseStudies.title: End-to-End Lending Platform for NBFC
caseStudies.challenge: Manual loan processing was taking 7-10 days, resulting in high operational costs and poor customer experience. High NPA rates due to inadequate credit assessment.
caseStudies.solution: Deployed automated lending management system with AI-powered credit scoring, digital KYC, and automated underwriting capabilities.
results: Loan processing time reduced from 7 days to 24 hours
caseStudies.impact: ₹200+ Cr additional revenue in first year

caseStudies.title: Payment Gateway Integration for Fintech Startup
caseStudies.challenge: Needed a scalable payment infrastructure to handle rapid growth and integrate with multiple payment methods and banks.
caseStudies.solution: Built a robust payment gateway with multi-channel support, real-time monitoring, and automated reconciliation.

caseStudies.title: RegTech Solution for Compliance Automation
caseStudies.challenge: Manual compliance processes were time-consuming and error-prone. Regulatory reporting required significant resources and was prone to delays.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented comprehensive RegTech platform with automated KYC, AML monitoring, and regulatory reporting.

caseStudies.title: Mobile-First Banking for Rural Cooperative Bank
caseStudies.challenge: Needed to serve rural customers with limited internet connectivity while expanding digital services.
caseStudies.solution: Developed lightweight mobile banking app with offline capabilities, vernacular language support, and agent-assisted banking.

caseStudies.title: Wealth Management Platform Modernization
caseStudies.challenge: Legacy wealth management system lacked modern portfolio management tools and client engagement features.
caseStudies.solution: Built comprehensive wealth management suite with robo-advisory, goal-based planning, and client portal.
caseStudies.impact: 40% growth in AUM in first year
